channel.title: Restore special altar PI!
channel.description:
Hey guys, well im adding to my pray altar on my PI server to restore special every 120 seconds, i did everything else but i cant seem to fix this 1 error! please help!
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/15x2vmh.jpg[/img]

item.title: Restore special altar PI!
item.dc:creator: @Joseph246 Joseph246
item.description:
@Joseph246 wrote:

um, but isnt that how the items are weared? like shield it puts it in the shield slot etc… can u help me abit with that? cuz i wanna go sleep soon

OH WAIT THINK I FOUND IT!!

THANKS MAN!

Read full topic

item.title: Restore special altar PI!
item.dc:creator: @hadesflames hadesflames
item.description:
@hadesflames wrote:

In ItemAssistant.java there’s a wearItem method. In it you will find something like:

if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("cape")) { targetSlot=1; } else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("hat")) { targetSlot=0; } else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("amulet")) { targetSlot=2; } else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("arrows")) { targetSlot=13; } else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("body")) { targetSlot=4; } else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("shield")) { targetSlot=5; } else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("legs")) { targetSlot=7; } else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("gloves")) { targetSlot=9; } else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("boots")) { targetSlot=10; } else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("ring")) { targetSlot=12; }

Under that you will see how items get their requirements. Just do something similar to that, but with w\e your donor/staff values are. I’m sure you can figure it out from here.

Read full topic

item.title: Restore special altar PI!
item.dc:creator: @hadesflames hadesflames
item.description:
@hadesflames wrote:

Yup.

Now replace all that with this:

case 409: if(c.playerLevel[5] < c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])) { c.startAnimation(645); c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]); c.sendMessage("You recharge your prayer points."); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); } else { c.sendMessage("You already have full prayer points."); break; } if(c.specAmount < 10.0){ if (c.specRestore > 0) return; c.specRestore = 120; c.specAmount = 10.0; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]); c.sendMessage("Your special attack has been restored, only every 120 seconds."); } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Restore special altar PI!
item.dc:creator: @Joseph246 Joseph246
item.description:
@Joseph246 wrote:

This?
The whole case 409 of altar

[code]case 409:
if(c.playerLevel[5] < c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])) {
c.startAnimation(645);
c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]);
c.sendMessage(“You recharge your prayer points.”);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You already have full prayer points.”);
break;

		if(c.specAmount < 10.0){
			if (c.specRestore > 0) return;
			c.specRestore = 120;
			c.specAmount = 10.0;
			c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]);
			c.sendMessage("Your special attack has been restored, only every 120 seconds.");
		}
		break;[/code]

item.title: Restore special altar PI!
item.dc:creator: @hadesflames hadesflames
item.description:
@hadesflames wrote:

As helpful as that screen shot is, you’re going to need to post up the code around there. The compiler is already telling you everything anyone will be able to tell you…That line of code it’s showing you is unreachable. It will never execute because based on the code you wrote, it’s impossible to reach that. You’re going to need to post up the code around there so that we can see why…

Read full topic
